name: Grand Theft Antilope
description:
Made in 2 days, our submission for the Sabotage Game Jam, organized by Conjure!
Thanks to all organisers and participants!

Jam theme: Exotic animals

Controls

Drive your truck using the A and D keys OR using the left/right arrows, and repair your damaged truck parts using the I, J, K and L keys.

Assets
  • Music: The Game Creator's Pack by Jonathan So (itch.io)
  • Input Prompts: Input Prompts Pixel 16x by Kenney
  • (And some copyrighted stuff that we had to include as challenges imposed by other teams...)
Special thanks (?) :
  • Nemeon
  • dante09
  • anonymehatano
